name: Assault Cuirass
lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

descriptions.name: Assault Aura
descriptions.description: Grants 25 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by -5.Radius: 900

notes: Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
